SEARCH
Package stockExchange.inputGeneration

Class DataGenerator

java.lang.Object
stockExchange.inputGeneration.DataGenerator
public class DataGenerator extends Object
The DataGenerator class generates data for a stock exchange simulation. The generated data is saved as CSV files containing order details like timestamp, price, quantity, and source of the order. The class contains methods to generate data for every second and for random seconds.

  • Method Details

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args) throws IOException
      The main method generates data for every second for TOTAL_SECONDS, and sorts the generated data.
      Parameters:
      args - the command line arguments.
      Throws:
      IOException - if there is an error creating the CSV files.

    • generateRecordsForEverySecond

      public static void generateRecordsForEverySecond(String csvFile, int totalSeconds)
      Generates CSV records for every second for a specified duration.
      Parameters:
      csvFile - the file path where the CSV records will be written
      totalSeconds - the total number of seconds for which records will be generated

    • generateRecordsForRandomSeconds

      public static void generateRecordsForRandomSeconds(String csvFile)
      Generates records for random timestamps and writes them to a CSV file.
      Parameters:
      csvFile - the path of the CSV file to be created

    • generateRecordsForAParticularSec

      public static int generateRecordsForAParticularSec(Timestamp time, FileWriter writer)
      Generates records for a particular second with the given timestamp and writes them to a CSV file.
      Parameters:
      time - The timestamp for the particular second.
      writer - The FileWriter object to write the generated records to the CSV file.
      Returns:
      The number of records generated for the particular second.

    • generateRandomOrderSource

      public static String generateRandomOrderSource()
      Returns a random order source from the predefined list of order sources.
      Returns:
      a randomly selected order source as a String

    • generateRandomPrice

      public static double generateRandomPrice()
      Generates a random price
      Returns:
      a price as a double between 195 and 197

    • generateRandomQuantity

      public static long generateRandomQuantity()
      Generates a random quantity
      Returns:
      a random quantity of long type

      public static double generateRandomNumber(int min, int max)

    • randomTimeStampGenerator

      public static Timestamp randomTimeStampGenerator(Timestamp startTime, Timestamp endTime)
      Generates a random Timestamp between the specified start and end Timestamp values.
      Parameters:

      endTime - the ending Timestamp value
      Returns:
      a randomly generated Timestamp within the specified range
